name: Encoded IEX
description: Detects a base64 encoded IEX command string in a process command line
pattern:
title: Encoded IEX
id: 88f680b8-070e-402c-ae11-d2914f2257f1
status: experimental
description: Detects a base64 encoded IEX command string in a process command line
author: Florian Roth
date: 2019/08/23
tags:
    - attack.t1086
    - attack.t1140
    - attack.execution
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        CommandLine|base64offset|contains: 
          - 'IEX (['
          - 'iex (['
          - 'iex (New'
          - 'IEX (New'
    condition: selection
fields:
    - CommandLine
    - ParentCommandLine
falsepositives:
    - unknown
level: critical
